All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
ArchipelagoWindow
Creates the Archipelago window that represents a map between the Islands
BaseRepository
An Abstract class that represents a Basic Repository.It helps mocking a Database to create the Entities used in the project(Ship, Island, Store, Item and so on).
CargoCurrentGoodsWindow
Creates the Window that shows the Ship cargo current goods
Entity
Every object in the game is an entity that has to have an identifier that will facilitate the game environment.
GameEnvironment
Abstract class with the main methods to allow the game to run only under the required conditions from project scope.
GameEnvironmentCmdLine
Creates the command line application
GameEnvironmentMessageHelper
Class to help the messages in the command line
GameEnvironmentStoreHelper
Helper class for the Store in the command line application
GameEnvironmentSwing
Creates the GUI interface application
Island
Class that models an Island Object.
IslandDetailWindow
Creates the window that shows the information about the selected Island from the ArchipelagoWindow
IslandRepository
Represents a database of Islands, it is used to create an ArrayList of Islands, from islands.csv.
IslandStoreWindow
Creates the window for the Store in the current Island
Item
Represents an Item of type Tradable that will be traded between Store and Trader.
ItemRepository
Represents a database of Items that are the goods traded in the game, it is used to create an ArrayList of Items, from items.csv, that then will be given to the Store to trade.
Main
Class where application execution begins.
MainWindow
Creates the Main window from where the Trader can access the Store, view Ship properties and set Sail.
Pirate
Represents a Pirate to be used in the RandomEvents encounters that will happen when Trader is sailing.
PirateRepository
Represents a database for the PirateRepository RandomEvent, it is used to create an ArrayList of type PirateRepository, with information from pirates.csv.
RandomEvent
Represents the Random Events that the Trader may encounter while sailing.
RandomEventService
It is a helper service for the RandomEvents, it is used to create the RandomEvents that will be added to the routes in the IslandRepository (getRoutesForIsland(Island newIsland, RandomEventService res)), according to the percentage chance of encounter, which is not final to 100% so the Trader has a chance of nothing happening.
RescuedSailor
Represents the RandomEvent "Rescued Sailors", when the Traders have this encounters they are rewarded with a monetary amount, that will vary depending on the number of Rescued Sailors they save.
Route
Routes represents the routes that connect the Islands, each Route has 3 possible random events that could happen, or nothing happening is also possibility
RouteInformationWindow
The window with a detailed description about the available routes for other Islands
SailorRepository
Represents a database for the RescuedSailor RandomEvent, it is used to create an ArrayList of type RescuedSailor, with information from RescuedSailor.csv.
SetupTraderWindow
The first window in the game, where the player informs the name, and duration of game in days, and chooses a Ship to captain
Ship
Class that models a Ship.
ShipRepository
Represents a database of Ships, it is used to create an ArrayList of type Ship, from ships.csv, from where the Trader will choose a Ship to captain.
Store
Represents a Store of type Entity that will exist in every Island, to allow trade of Tradables between Store and Trader.
StoreRepository
Represents a database of Stores, it is used to create an ArrayList of Stores, from stores.csv, that then will be given to the Islands.
StoreTradable
Represents the Store Tradable Relationship, also of type Entity as each store-tradable will have its own relationship to be identified, which will be used to relate the Tradables to the Stores and the quantity of each Tradable that the Store buys/sells.
Tradable
Class that represents a basic item or upgrade that will be traded between Trader and Island'Stores
Trader
A Trader Object used to represent the player and captain the Ship and trade StoreTradable goods
UnfortunateWeather
Represents the RandomEvent "Unfortunate Weather, this could be a Thunder storm, very Strong Winds etc and will give some random amount of damage to the Trader's Ship, the Ship may endure more if it has any upgrades to help it.
UnfortunateWeatherRepository
Represents a database for the UnfortunateWeather RandomEvent, it is used to create an ArrayList of type UnfortunateWeather, with information from UnfortunateWeather.csv.
Upgrade
Represents an upgrade that the Trader can buy to equip their ship.
UpgradeRepository
Represents a database of Upgrades, it is used to create an ArrayList of Upgrades, from upgrades.csv, that then will be given to the Stores to trade.
